resources.string: This activity will display the list of songs and artists using the ListView. This activity is reached from the main screen.

This activity is opened from the main screen and displays album info in a GridView layout. The album info will be populated by an album class(not implemented) which will contain an album image, artist name and album name.
This activity is reached from main screen and will load items from an online store in a ListView layout.
This activity is reached from the main activity and is used by the user to search for a particular song.
